extort.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to illegally force someone to give you something, especially money, by threatening them
extort.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Rebels extorted money from local villagers.
extort.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to illegally force someone to give you money by threatening them
extort.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Smith was arrested on suspicion of having extorted property and money from at least 18 clients.
